text.div: Goal: Maintain blood pressure control with blood pressure readings below 140/90 mmHg; diagnosis of high blood pressure is established by more than one reading of above 140/90 mm Hg within a 4 week period

note.text: Maintain blood pressure control with blood pressure readings below 140/90 mmHg; diagnosis of high blood pressure is established by more than one reading of above 140/90 mm Hg within a 4 week period
